title: thunderbird stopped working
content: Thunderbird stopped working today. It won't download any messages, it wants me to enter a new password. I have the correct password and can log into my mail on wowway.net I did not touch anything, it just stopped working. All the POP settings are correct per wowway website. Should I uninstall it? It seems a new update was released on 11-12. When I opened it on 11-13, it didn't work. Please help. spruden@gmail.com
creator: spruden

title: je ne peu pas recevoir ou émettre demail
content: que dois je faire pour recevoir mes mail
creator: benoit.gourlain

title: Need to get the option back I unchecked but cant find the option now to restore it.
content: How do I get back the choice to get a message brought in manually and other features that were above my account name. I unchecked a box (it was called something board) and it was gone but cant find it to restore the option. I right clicked on that to get a drop down menu with a few choices. I cant remember exactly what they said. One of the icons was for manually bringing in my mail, like a refresh option as well as some other choices beside it. This was visible above my account name which is just above the inbox. Anyone have any idea where I find that again to restore it? One click and it was gone! :-( Hope I explained it good. Thank you
creator: purpleribbon

title: Notification sound for new mail does not play/Cannot set WAV file.
content:
Thank you for your help. I don't know when this started happening, but I noticed that the notification sound for new emails was not working. You can switch between the default (D) or WAV file (U) in Settings → New mail notification → Play sound, but it will not work no matter which one you select. Also, in the field for specifying WAV files, the directory of the file specified from the previous version is entered, but I cannot delete it (see attached image).

Thank you for your support. (Powered by Google)
creator: hsyy1021

title: File Icons on Attachments
content: When I add attachments when replying to emails, the file icons on those attachments don't display. This only happens when replying, the file icons display when receiving emails. Have tried many things to fix this including using ChatGTP with no luck. What can I do to fix this?
creator: craig.riddell9

title: Spostare cartelle da posizione errata
content: Buongiorno, ho un Account email Pec di Aruba che ho aggiunto su Thunderbid, per problemi nella email ho dovuto reinstallarla; tutto andato a buon fine se non fosse che la cartella Bozze e Posta inviata invece di essere sotto l'account Pec sono finite sotto cartelle locali che ho creato tempo fa per salvare vecchie email di account dismessi. Come posso spostare le due voci nella posizione corretta visto che non c'è una voce diretta con "sposta". Grazie del supporto.
creator: rscolari
